title: Sans Serif Condensed Bold Headline font
author: dirtcastle

comments.content:
This looks like it could be one of the Knockouts:  
 [http://typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?productLineID=100013](http://web.archive.org/web/20140605033840/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?productLineID=100013 "http://typography.com/fonts/font\_styles.php?productLineID=100013")

46, maybe?

Yes, it must be Knockout. If not... Knockout will certainly do the job. Oh wait... bloody hell... the price! $170 is not exactly in the budget. That would leave me $30. :-(

I found [Steelfish](http://web.archive.org/web/20140605033840/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=steelfish&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=SOUNDCLASH&nb_ppp=10&psize=l&classt=alpha) over at DaFont, which is maybe a tad 2nd rate compared to Knockout. But the price is right.

Oh, and thank you for the great ID!

I may not like the price, but the font is still amazing.

Ah... Tilting Gothic... also very nice and maybe just as close, no? On the surface, the only major difference between Tilting and Knockout are the different weights available.

Thanks, Stephen!

Be sure to look for _Titling_, not _Tilting_ ;-)  
And you're welcome. I wish I had Knockout, too!
ahha... Titling... must have been a reverse Freudian slip.
